summary: This document contains due diligence research results for The Haze Trust, indicating no significant negative media or legal alerts were found. It outlines the compliance checks performed and the absence of alerts in various databases, suggesting a clean record for the subject of the search.

persons.name: Priyanka Sharma
persons.context: Priyanka Sharma prepared the due diligence report for The Haze Trust, indicating the results of various compliance checks.

keyFacts: The Haze Trust was searched for compliance due diligence with no significant negative media results found.
No alerts were found in the RDC and FIRCOSOFT databases for The Haze Trust.
The document was prepared by Priyanka Sharma on October 1, 2018.
The report indicates that all accounts involving Politically Exposed Persons (PEPs) must be escalated.
No court cases or public records were found related to The Haze Trust.
